thread.title: The Eagles Couldn’t Stop Tom Brady, Until the Very End

author: Jared Diamond
title: The Eagles Couldn’t Stop Tom Brady, Until the Very End
text:
Minneapolis
To win Super Bowl LII, the Philadelphia Eagles did what usually seems impossible: They stopped Tom Brady. With the game on the line. Twice.
Brady’s ability to bring the New England Patriots back from the abyss in the moments that matter typically defies belief. He overcame a 28-3 second-half deficit in last year’s Super Bowl.... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
